title: a secure connection with this site cannot be verified pop up
body: Ok I'm back again. Now when i log in a pop up shows saying a secure connection with this site cannot be verified. would you like to continue and this has never happened. It won't let me do anything after that other it showing that I am in a game reconnect. which I am not in a game

replies.body: A lot of the assets in the client uses assets from Internet Explorer.  If any settings there were changed or messed up, it could cause problems with your client.  I recommend resetting your IE settings to default, which should get this fixed up.  Let me know if that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=IcunOMI9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-19T20:12:30.764+0000)
>
> A lot of the assets in the client uses assets from Internet Explorer.  If any settings there were changed or messed up, it could cause problems with your client.  I recommend resetting your IE settings to default, which should get this fixed up.  Let me know if that helps!

Update: the pop up still persists but it has finally stopped saying that I'm in a game

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=IcunOMI9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-19T20:12:30.764+0000)
>
> A lot of the assets in the client uses assets from Internet Explorer.  If any settings there were changed or messed up, it could cause problems with your client.  I recommend resetting your IE settings to default, which should get this fixed up.  Let me know if that helps!

Well I don't use IE. I haven't changed any settings either. I use firefox and I haven't changed anything there either but I reset firefox anyway. Still the same thing is happening. I log in get there that pop up shows up. I hit yes and then it just sits there saying I'm in a game.
